EmailTemplate.name: License Issued Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: City of ( ) - {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Type__c} License {!MUSW__License2__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your {!MUSW__License2__c.MUSW__Type__c} License ({!MUSW__License2__c.Name}) is has been issued and a copy of it is attached to this email.
You can always log into the City of ( ) License and Inspections Center anytime to view your license's status, pay outstanding fees or print your issued license.
